2080940.name: Turbo Force
2080940.description:
Turbo Force is an ultra fast anti-gravity racing game with online competitions, deep gameplay mechanics, and a track editor. Use your momentum to solve unique platforming challenges and gain an edge over your opponents!

Key Features

  • High Risk Gameplay: Out-race your opponents by sacrificing your ship's energy for speed or go all in with dangerous aerial stunts.
  • Grand Prix Racing: Race against AI controlled vehicles or other human players in thrilling, high stakes matches.
  • Survival Racing: Survive to the finish line in treacherous, hazard filled tracks.
  • Online Multiplayer: Play online with other racers in the Versus, Time Trial, and Survival racing modes.
  • Leaderboard + Replays: Compete against the ghosts of your rivals for the fastest completion times on tracks.
  • Level Editor: Create and share custom levels with the racing community on the Steam Workshop.
2080940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
